name: MPMediaPickerController
desc: A specialized view controller that provides a graphical interface for selecting media items.

items.name: init(mediaTypes: MPMediaType)
items.desc: Initializes a media item picker for specified media types.

items.name: var delegate: MPMediaPickerControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate for a media item picker.

items.name: protocol MPMediaPickerControllerDelegate
items.desc: The protocol you implement so that a media item picker can respond to a user making media item selections.

items.name: var allowsPickingMultipleItems: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value specifying the default selection behavior for a media item picker.

items.name: var showsCloudItems: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value specifying whether to display iCloud Media Library items for a media picker.

items.name: var mediaTypes: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media types that media item picker presents.

items.name: var prompt: String?
items.desc: A prompt, for the user, that appears above the navigation bar buttons.

items.name: var showsItemsWithProtectedAssets: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value specifying if protect assets are displayed.
